Recipe template

This template is being used in "Cooking" section of the website.

Baked vegan potatoes

Delicious vegan, but creamy potatoes!

Prep. time: 15 mins Total time: 50 mins
2 - 3 portions
#meat-dish #diary-free

Ingredients

Butter

  • 500g flour
  • raw spinach / arugula
  • 4 tbs corn starch

Filling

  • 200g tofu

Instructions

  1. Mix dry ingredience for butter

    In big bowl mix 1 tsp of onion powder, 1 tsp of garlic powder, 500g white flour.

  2. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet
